itunes:title: Isaiah 40-49 Part 1 • Dr. Terry Ball • Sept. 19-25
title: Isaiah 40-49 Part 1 • Dr. Terry Ball • Sept. 19-25
description:
Can studying Isaiah be like eating brussel sprouts? Dr. Terry Ball examines how studying the words, prophecies, and covenants in Isaiah can become a joy to Latter-day Saints, and all who seek the comfort the Savior offers.

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
